languages.text: "Зачем подавлять в себе гнев? Обрати его на службу закона. Преподай врагам такой урок боли и ужаса, что остальные и не вздумают преступать Лекс".
"Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."
languages.original_text: "Зачем подавлять в себе гнев? Обрати его на службу закона. Преподай врагам такой урок боли и ужаса, что остальные и не вздумают преступать Лекс".

traits.locale_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."
"Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."
"Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."
"Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."
"Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

languages.text: 「なぜ怒りを抑える？その怒りを法のために使うんだ。敵どもに痛みと恐怖を刻み込み、残った者たちが二度とレックスに背こうなどと夢にも思わないようにしてやれ」
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ怒りを抑える？その怒りを法のために使うんだ。敵どもに痛みと恐怖を刻み込み、残った者たちが二度とレックスに背こうなどと夢にも思わないようにしてやれ」

languages.text: "Weshalb Eure Wut unterdrücken? Nutzt sie im Diente des Gesetzes. Erteilt Euren Feinden eine solche Lektion in Schmerz und Angst, dass der Rest nicht einmal mehr davon träumt, den Lex zu brechen."
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: "Weshalb Eure Wut unterdrücken? Nutzt sie im Diente des Gesetzes. Erteilt Euren Feinden eine solche Lektion in Schmerz und Angst, dass der Rest nicht einmal mehr davon träumt, den Lex zu brechen."

languages.text: « Pourquoi tenter de contenir votre colère ? Mettez-la au service de la loi. Infligez à vos ennemis une telle leçon de douleur et de terreur que les autres ne songeront plus jamais à défier la Lex. »
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi tenter de contenir votre colère ? Mettez-la au service de la loi. Infligez à vos ennemis une telle leçon de douleur et de terreur que les autres ne songeront plus jamais à défier la Lex. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué reprime su furia? Canalícela para servir a la ley. Imparta a sus enemigos tal lección de dolor y terror que los demás ni siquiera se atrevan a soñar con quebrantar la Lex».
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué reprime su furia? Canalícela para servir a la ley. Imparta a sus enemigos tal lección de dolor y terror que los demás ni siquiera se atrevan a soñar con quebrantar la Lex».

languages.text: “为什么要压抑你的怒火？用你的愤怒为帝国法律服务吧。让你的敌人尝到痛苦与恐惧的教训，让其他人再也不敢违逆帝国法典吧。”
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: “为什么要压抑你的怒火？用你的愤怒为帝国法律服务吧。让你的敌人尝到痛苦与恐惧的教训，让其他人再也不敢违逆帝国法典吧。”

languages.text: "Öfkeni neden bastırasın? Öfkeni kullanarak kanunlara hizmet etmenin yolunu bul. Düşmanlara acı ve dehşet yoluyla öyle dersler ver ki kalanlar, Lex'i ihlal etmenin hayalini bile kuramasın."
languages.original_text: "Why suppress your anger? Turn it to the service of the law. Teach your enemies such a lesson in pain and terror that the rest will never dream of violating the Lex."

traits.locale_text: "Öfkeni neden bastırasın? Öfkeni kullanarak kanunlara hizmet etmenin yolunu bul. Düşmanlara acı ve dehşet yoluyla öyle dersler ver ki kalanlar Lex'i ihlal etmenin hayalini bile kuramasınlar."
